entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
